description: This delicious fish pie has a vibrant green topping and lots of bright flavours.
keywords: Fish Pie with Lemon & Pea Mash
name: Fish Pie with Lemon & Pea Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the creamy sauce into a casserole dish, spread the mash on top and bake for 15-20 minutes until bubbling and golden.
